org.deeplearning4j.hadoop.datasetiterator

Class BaseHdfsDataSetIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.hadoop.datasetiterator.BaseHdfsDataSetIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Iterator<DataSet>, DataSetIterator

    public abstract class BaseHdfsDataSetIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSetIterator
    Baseline support for a dataset iterator iterating over hdfs data
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseHdfsDataSetIterator

        public BaseHdfsDataSetIterator(java.lang.String hdfsUriRootDir)
        Constructs a data set iterator with the hdfs uri root directory. This assumes that individual files are what are being read from wrt helper methods present. hasNext() and associated data specific methods can be configured for the specific implementation.
        Parameters:
        hdfsUriRootDir -

        Reads a file from hdfs in to a string. Note that this is not smart on large files, however I will not hand hold you here.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the contents of the file
